description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国守边员，柯尔克孜族。因长期在中国与吉尔吉斯斯坦边境线上巡边，于2019年获“人民楷模”国家荣誉称号。
description.en: A border guard of the People's Republic of China, of Kirgiz ethnicity. She was awarded the 'People's Role Model' national honorary title in 2019 for her long-term patrol of the border between China and Kyrgyzstan.
An ethnic minority group in China.

description.zh-cn: 东亚的一个社会主义国家，通称中国。
description.en: A socialist state in East Asia, commonly known as China.
A landlocked country in Central Asia.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的国家荣誉称号之一。
description.en: One of the national honorary titles of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国授予在各领域作出重大贡献的杰出人士的最高荣誉。
description.en: The highest honor awarded by the People's Republic of China to outstanding individuals who have made significant contributions in various fields.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 布茹玛汗·毛勒朵是新疆乌恰人。
description.en: Burmakan Molde is from Wuqia, Xinjiang.

description.zh-cn: 布茹玛汗·毛勒朵是柯尔克孜族人。
description.en: Burmakan Molde is of the Kirgiz ethnicity.

description.zh-cn: 担任中华人民共和国的守边员，长期在中国和吉尔吉斯斯坦的边境线上巡边。
description.en: Served as a border guard for the People's Republic of China, patrolling the border line between China and Kyrgyzstan for a long time.

description.zh-cn: 于2019年9月17日获得“人民楷模”国家荣誉称号。
description.en: Was awarded the 'People's Role Model' national honorary title on September 17, 2019.

description.zh-cn: “人民楷模”是“国家荣誉称号”的一种。
description.en: The 'People's Role Model' is a type of 'National Honorary Title'.

description.zh-cn: 根据页面分类，布茹玛汗·毛勒朵是中国共产党党员。
description.en: According to the page category, Burmakan Molde is a member of the Communist Party of China.
